description: Position of rightmost 0 (including leading 0) in 2^n increases.
comments: "Positions" are counted 0,1,2,3,... starting with the least significant digit.86 is the last n for which the rightmost zero is the leading zero.
links: Alan Griffiths, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..46
author: _Matthew Cook_, _Dan Hoey_, _Eric W. Weisstein_, _David W. Wilson_
extensions: a(39)-a(41) added (to match A031140) by _Tanya Khovanova_, Feb 02 2011
